newsitem.title: POLAND: Polish net reserves inch up to $21.62 bln in Nov.
newsitem.headline: Polish net reserves inch up to $21.62 bln in Nov.

text.p: Polish net foreign currency reserves in the banking system grew by $21 million in November to $21.62 billion and were $2.22 billion higher than a year ago, the National Bank of Poland said.
Official reserves grew $1.18 billion in the January-November period.
POLISH RESERVES (bln dollars) NOV 96 OCT 96 NOV 95
NOTE - Figures in billions of dollars. Official reserves are those held by the state. Net reserves mean the total amount of hard currencies in the whole banking system.
